thread.title: Kenya: Court releases jailed doctors' union officials
thread.title_full: Kenya: Court releases jailed doctors' union officials

title: Kenya: Court releases jailed doctors' union officials

organizations.name: kenya national commission on human rights

text:
Your are here » Home » Kenya Court releases jailed doctors’ union officials By Standard Reporter | Updated Wed, February 15th 2017 at 11:52 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter 
Kenya Medical Practitioners and Dentist Union officials Ouma Oluga and Mwachond Chibanzi on February 13 when they were taken away to prison. (Photo: George Njunge/Standard) 
The court of Appeal Wednesday ordered the release of seven medical doctors’s union officials who had been sentenced to one month in jail on February 13. 
The officials have been set free pending hearing and determination of the appeal and parties are expected back in court on February 23. 
Negotiations will resume immediately and a team from the Law Society of Kenya and Kenya National Commission on Human Rights will jointly lead the mediation efforts.
